title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 152 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
January 29, 2013

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 152




Â 
On Tuesday, January 29, 2013, the President signed into law:
H.R. 152, which provides fiscal year 2013 supplemental appropriations to respond to and recover from the severe damage caused by Hurricane Sandy.
